quest.name: The Limits of Our Endurance
journal: If you still want for work, Alisaie has a suggestion.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Everything all right?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Dairyu Moon Gates have guarded the approach to Doma Castle since long before the imperial occupation.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We do not anticipate any great difficulty in gaining entry to the gatehouse as our Doman friends know its every nook and cranny. The challenge will come in preserving the element of surprise. But I am confident the shinobi will rise to the occasion.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: During the rebellion, the imperials turned to their agents among the shinobi, and through their treachery were many of my comrades slaughtered.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We few who survived have not forgotten that day. The memory of it has spurred us never to neglect our training, that we might be ready to administer revenge.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'd tell you to rest and leave the rest to the others, but seeing as that isn't in your nature...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Lyse returned but a moment ago, looking a bit worried. It would seem that trouble is afoot in Namai.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You may as well go and ask her about it. As for me, I will not impose upon you any further.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We've barely got enough armor as it is, huh...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Oh, you're here to help? That's a relief. I've been trying to help the villagers in Namai get ready for the operation, but we've run into a few problems...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: You remember how we're supposed to stir up trouble as a diversion, right? Well, the thing is, we don't have enough armor to go around.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I thought the Doman Liberation Front would be able to furnish us with some, but it seems that's not the case. I was about to go and tell Isse─why don't you come too?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We'll have to come up with a solution somehow.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Oh, you're here too. I heard about those soldiers you and Alisaie encountered. I'm glad you're all right... Ahem. Right, then...

dialogue.name: CHIGUSA
dialogue.text: Isse─we have gathered up all the rope we could find in the village.

dialogue.name: MIYAMA
dialogue.text: And every tool with an edge, but it is still not enough. Even a hoe would suffice, but there are no more to spare.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Chigusa. Ryosen could use a hand, if there is nothing else.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: As for more tools...I may have some in my home. Go and search it─take whatever meets your needs.

dialogue.name: AZAMI
dialogue.text: I made enough rice balls for everyone─including some special ones for Lady Yugiri. Can I go and give them to her?

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Y-You silly little girl, of course you can! Hurry! You never know when she'll have to leave on a secret mission!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Sorry about that. Everyone's been trying to contribute since Lord Hien returned. There's so much to worry about.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: You're doing well, Isse...though I have to ask: have you had any luck finding more armor?

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, no. Unlike weapons, there are no substitutes for proper protection...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: It's not as though we need full suits of imperial plate, but we're not soldiers. If we attack without any equipment, we'll be slaughtered.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: The Doman Liberation Front doesn't have any armor to spare. I suppose we could ask Hancock, but there's no telling how long it would take for him to send us supplies...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Do you have an armorer in the village, or anyone with some skill to fashion armor?

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: There is one man. A craftsman who fled the enclave. He is experienced, and may be able to help.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: I don't know if I can persuade him to, though. But maybe you two could come with me?

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: His name is Tsuranuki, and he lives in Kusakari, in the south. Come with me.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: There's something odd about this man...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: This...is Tsuranuki.

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Bwahahaha! Who are these starry-eyed youths who stand before me?

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Ones who sing of rebellion? Of liberation? Hah hah hah! Surely they would not think to trouble me with such foolish dreams!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Oh, go and say what you will. But do not take offense if I die from laughter! Bwahahaha!
